def_en: An error is something you have done which is considered to be incorrect or wrong, or which should not have been done.
If you do something in error or if it happens in error, you do it or it happens because you have made a mistake, especially in your judgment.

def_cn: （认识到）错误;（意识到）失误
def_en: If someone sees the error of their ways, they realize or admit that they have made a mistake or behaved badly.
